titleStmt.title: A view of the court of St Germain since the year 1690. With an account of the entertainment Protestants meet with there. : Directed to the malecontents Protestants of England.
titleStmt.author: Macky, John, d. 1726.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by Andrew Crook, and again re-printed at Glasgow, by Robert Sanders, one of His Majesty's printers.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Macky by Wing.
Imperfect: tightly bound, torn, and cropped with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University Library.

person.persName: Robert Sanders, one of His Majesty's printers.
